entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Shell Flyout overlaps Title bar #22672
  • Android keystore parameter is relative to the project path not the working directory. #22671
  • Unhandled Exception appearing randomly #22670
  • DatePicker and TimePicker use outdated controls on iOS #22669
  • [Android] ListView item rendering breaks when activity is Finished #22668
  • Use native styling in project template #22667
  • Scrollview doesn't recognize scroll command after any gesture recognizer implemented #22666
  • Views don’t default to native attributes #22665
  • Entry indicator wireframe rendering offset issue after clear button display #22662
    Backlog
  • Unable to scroll Horizontal GridItemsLayout in CollectionView with a mouse wheel #22659
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Tooltip doesn't work #22658

Closed

  • [Windows] .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 4 throws a "combase.dll: A fail fast exception occurred" upon making a grid visible on Windows #22654
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] WindowSoftInputModeAdjust not working anymore #18041
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • SetSoftInputMode does not work #22653
  • ListView Scrolled event is not triggered #22630
    Backlog
  • Issue with Essentials.WebAuthenticator and multiple activities #22017
  • react native is used extensively in microsoft. Why should anyone use maui? #22657

PullRequests

Created

  • [XC] Fix loading non-compiled ResourceDictionary #22664
    area-xaml
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22660
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • Weak Parent #22561
    area-controls-general, t/perf
  • [iOS] Fix ListView Scrolled event not triggering #22661
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed creation of the CustomTabsActivityManager #22018
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [testing] Try xunit 2.6.6 with 2.8.0 vs runner #22621
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
    area-testing, area-controls-button
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category (or any filter) #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
